title: Council Regulation (EC) No 1366/95 of 12 June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3906/89 in order to extend economic aid to Croatia
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 1366/95 of 12  June 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3906/89 in order to extend economic aid to Croatia
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The following country shall be added to the list in the Annex to  Regulation (EEC) No 3906/89: 'Croatia`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 12 June 1995.
For the Council The President H. de CHARETTE
